page.title: 04Employment,S'key & C'thorpe.
page.content:
{Agriculture and sea- farming:} proportion engaged in full-time agriculture has decreased owing to mechanisation. Some seasonal employment. Traditional cockle, samphire, winkle gathering now only small industries. Lug-worm digging still important.
{Skilled occupations, subsidiary {industries:}significant number of self-employed or employed in building, engineering, clerical professions and in decorative arts. Some tourist industry in season.
{Unemployment and retirement:} some unemployment; retired population growing.
